This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.10.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.9.x releases.

==Mobs==
===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|General
|
|
* Made slight adjustments to each animal so that the walking animation is now faster.
* Hostile mobs now spawn in groups.
* Baby animals can now swim.
|-
|[[Slime]]
|[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Slimes now have a bouncing animation.
|}

==Blocks==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Blocks}}
|-
|Birch, spruce, jungle, acacia and dark oak [[fence]]s
|{{Animate|Birch Fence (EW) JE1.png; Spruce Fence (EW) JE1.png; Jungle Fence (EW) JE1.png; Acacia Fence (EW) JE1.png; Dark Oak Fence (EW) JE1.png|84px}}{{verify|are these models correct or did Bedrock Edition map textures differently?}}
|Dark oak fences are generated in mineshafts in [[badlands]].
{{Crafting
|A2=Spruce Planks; Birch Planks; Jungle Planks; Acacia Planks; Dark Oak Planks
|B2=Stick
|C2=Spruce Planks; Birch Planks; Jungle Planks; Acacia Planks; Dark Oak Planks
|A3=Spruce Planks; Birch Planks; Jungle Planks; Acacia Planks; Dark Oak Planks

|C3=Spruce Planks; Birch Planks; Jungle Planks; Acacia Planks; Dark Oak Planks

|type=Decoration block
}}
|They can be destroyed with any tool or with bare hands, but using [[axe]] is the fastest.
|Mobs cannot jump over.

|
